item.title: I'm moving from Wordpress to Hugo
item.description: I used Wordpress to handle my website. But I have 1 problem with Wordpress, that is the admin dashboard is too overwhelming to use. And then, I discovered Hugo from (Eric Murphy’s Website)[https://ericmurphy.xyz/]. I looked at the Hugo’s advantages and I found that Hugo is suitable for me. So, today, I’ll be using Hugo to power my website.
